title: Endings Guide
content:
ending you will get at the end. This page covers each ending for the main story and every character, and the requirements to reach each ending.

How many endings are there in Baldur's Gate 3?

From an interview with one of Larian Studios' lead writers, it was revealed that Baldur's Gate 3 will have 17,000 ending variations on release. That is not to say that there are thousands of unique main story endings, however, given the sheer number of variations there are, it is safe to say that starting
